name: Anime Crimes Division
summary: In Neo Otaku City, there are two kinds of people. The kind of people that can recite the Sailor Moon theme song from memory in the original Japanese, and the kind that don't belong there. When someone commits a crime against anime, they don't call the police. They call: the Anime Crimes Division.
info:
• 中文名: 动漫刑事司
  • 放送星期: 星期四
  • 别名: 动漫犯罪司
  • 集数: 3

eps.name: Subs vs. Dubs
eps.desc: Joe Furaya, the top shot lone wolf lead detective of Neo Otaku City's Anime Crimes Division, is partnered with rookie Diesel as they try and stop a gang war between the Subs and Dubs gangs.

eps.name: Playing for Keeps
eps.desc: Joe and Diesel must infiltrate a high stakes underground Yu-Gi-Oh game to win back a valuable and rare stolen card.

eps.name: The Gundam Killer
eps.desc: Joe and Diesel must solve the case of a Gundam serial killer loose on Neo Otaku City's streets.
